comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Setup MkDocs documentation:

**MkDocs Configuration (mkdocs.yml):**
- Material theme with light/dark mode toggle
- Inter font for text/headings, JetBrains Mono for code
- Navigation features: tabs, instant loading, search
- Plugins: search, mkdocstrings (API docs), custom CSS
- Markdown extensions: admonitions, code highlighting, emoji, etc.
- Page tree: Home, User Guide, Development, API Reference

**Documentation Pages Created:**
- index.md: Project overview, features, quick start
- installation.md: Install methods (PyPI, source, pipx), API key setup
- quickstart.md: First conversation, usage examples, tips & tricks
- user-guide/getting-started.md: Core concepts, usage modes, best practices
- user-guide/configuration.md: Config file, providers, env vars, profiles
- user-guide/usage.md: Common patterns, workflows, shell integration
- api/index.md: API reference with code examples
- development.md: Already exists from SOUL-13
- assets/css/consoul.css: Custom styling with brand colors

**Updated Files:**
- pyproject.toml: Replaced Sphinx with MkDocs dependencies
- Makefile: Added docs and docs-serve targets

**Documentation ready for:**
`make docs` - Build static site
`make docs-serve` - Local preview at http://127.0.0.1:8000
